name: Fruity Jar - Falling Fruit Game
description:
Are you looking for an addictive fruit falling game to sharpen your mind? Do you like fruit drop games? Can you collect the right fruit in the right color jar before it fells on the ground? Let’s download Fruity Jar – Falling Fruit Game for free. The perfect fruit fall crush game is ready for you now. 

Fruity Jar – Falling Fruit Game is one of the best fruit jar games. with eye-catching graphics, sweet fruits, and awesome animation effects. Our new fruit catcher game provides challenging levels filled with unique missions and various fruits to make the game hard to beat. Discover our fruit splash game now, and enjoy catching fruits! 

Fruity Jar – Falling Fruit Game has various features that will enhance your experience. Join the world of fruits, play like a fruit master, collect the right fruit in the right color jar before it fells on the ground, challenge your brain power and play with consistency to make a great high score collecting lots of fruits. You’re going to love this fruit catching game. 

The fruits are ripe and they are falling from the trees. Make sure to play fast and think before every move, make combinations, catch all the fruits, and become the fruit legend. 
 
                   Why you have to download and install Fruity Jar – Falling Fruit Game on your android Smartphone or tablet? 

It’s very easy to play, so you need just to install it for free on your device and use it instantly.  

It provides challenging levels with various fruits for unlimited entertainment. 

It’s free and it will stay free for life, so there are no hidden fees, no special memberships and no annual subscription fees. 

 • How to play? •  

Simple click to switch the jars. 

Collect the right fruit in the right color jar 

Repeat that process until there are no fruits on the screen touch  

Increase your score and beat levels. 

• Features •  

Free & Easy to play 

Various fruits 

Beautiful graphics 

Harmonies and fun sounds 

Challenging levels 

Awesome animation effects 

No internet connection required to play  

Fruity Jar – Falling Fruit Game is extremely fun, addictive and will keep you entertained for hours. If you love the fruit blast games, then Fruity Jar is the perfect game for you. 
Download it for Free now!
